media:group.media:title: Hermeneutics: An Introduction
media:group.media:description:
In this video Kyle defines hermeneutics and explains how it was picked up as a tool by theologians who sought to reconstruct a system of belief in light of many of the challenges of the Enlightenment.
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnhFs...
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/TheologyMatters
Email: yestheologymatters@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheologyComrade
Twitter: https://twitter.com/theologycomrade
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/theology_co...
PayPal: https://paypal.me/TheologyMatters
Share this video: https://youtu.be/EHmDizqvNig
Some of the links in the description are affiliate links, which means that if you click on one of the product links, I will receive a small commission.
Recommended Resources:
Daniel L. Migliore, Faith Seeking Understanding: An Introduction to Christian Theology, third ed. Grand Rapids: Wim. B. Publishing Co. Eerdmans, 2014. http://amzn.to/2E9fcqz (affiliate)
Peter C. Hodgson and Robert H. King, eds. Christian Theology: An Introduction to Its Traditions and Tasks. Minneapolis: Fortress Press, 1994. http://amzn.to/2FS6fA0 (affiliate)
Serene Jones and Paul Lakeland, eds. Constructive Theology: A Contemporary Approach to Classical Themes. Minneapolis: Fortress Press, 2005. http://amzn.to/2Ewlgap (affiliate)
William Placher, ed. Essentials of Christian Theology. Louisville: Westminster John Knox Press, 2003. http://amzn.to/2DuJC6E (affiliate)
Jens Zimmermann on Hermeneutics: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6wPTV5hyB0Y
https://plato.stanford.edu/archives/win2014/entries/hermeneutics/

media:group.media:title: Revelation/knowledge of God!
media:group.media:description:
In this video Kyle talks about the doctrine of revelation and how both the Reformation and the Enlightenment shifted the way that many theologians think about this doctrine today.

entry.title: What in the World Is Process Theology?

media:group.media:title: What in the World Is Process Theology?
media:group.media:description:
In this video Kyle helps to unpack what people mean when they talk about "Process Theology".
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnhFs...
Share this video: https://youtu.be/SlZlBhYgw14
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/TheologyMatters
Email: yestheologymatters@gmail.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/theologycomrade
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/theology_comrade/
PayPal: https://paypal.me/TheologyMatters
Video Resources:
Why Go Process? w/Monica A. Colemann and Tripp Fuller: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KEe8aNn9nDs
Thomas J. Oord and Tripp Fuller talk about "Christian Process Theology" at the Seizing an Alternative Conference: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Da466-vYJak
Thomas J. Oord - What is Process Theology?: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-uy30q3N8mA
Marjorie Suchocki - An Introduction to Process Theology: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OQl3to2ho_A
Online Resources:
Jay McDaniel - What Do Process Thinkers Believe: http://www.jesusjazzbuddhism.org/what-do-process-thinkers-believe.html
Rabbi Bradley Shavit Artson - Constellation of Process Theology - An Invitation: http://www.openhorizons.org/a-very-short-introduction-to-process-theology.html
Rabbi Bradley Shavit Artson - ​God Almighty? No Way!: http://www.openhorizons.org/god-almighty-no-way.html
Jay McDaniel - What is Process Thought?: http://www.jesusjazzbuddhism.org/what-is-process-thought.html
http://www.openhorizons.org/
Book Resources:
"Process-Relational Philosophy: An Introduction to Alfred North Whitehead" by Robert C. Mesle http://amzn.to/2DrazYD (affiliate)
"Process Theology: A Basic Introduction" by Robert C. Mesle http://amzn.to/2Dh1xtP (affiliate)
"Creating Women's Theology: A Movement Engaging Process Thought" by Monica A. Coleman http://amzn.to/2DnAJMP (affiliate)
"God Christ Church: A Practical Guide to Process Theology" by Marjorie Hewitt Suchocki http://amzn.to/2BeeiU9 (affiliate)
"God of Becoming and Relationship: The Dynamic Nature of Process Theology" By Rabbi Bradley Shavit Artson http://amzn.to/2FQFYSL (affiliate)

media:group.media:title: What is Theology?
media:group.media:description:
In this video, Kyle helps define what theology is, explains how it is all around us, and talks about why you should care about theology.
Note: It should be "Evagrius of Pontus" not "Ponticus". I will also fix the subscribe animation in the next video.
